title: Shovels & Rope: In Marriage And Music, A 'Psychic' Bond
teaser: Relationships are complicated, and as Cary Ann Hearst says of her marriage and musical partner Michael Trent, "It's a strange thing to be held accountable as part of the musical act."
contentencoded:
For more conversations with music-makers, check out NPR's Music Interviews.
